org.diet4j.core

Class AbstractScanningModuleRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diet4j.core.ModuleRegistry
      • org.diet4j.core.AbstractModuleRegistry
        • org.diet4j.core.AbstractScanningModuleRegistry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InClasspathModuleRegistry, ScanningClasspathModuleRegistry, ScanningDirectoriesModuleRegistry

    public abstract class AbstractScanningModuleRegistry
extends AbstractModuleRegistry
    Collections functionality common to ModuleRegistry implementations that determine the set of available ModuleMetas through a scan. Keeps the set of available Modules in memory and does not rescan.

    • Field Summary

      Name of the (optional) property in pom.xml that identifies the activation/deactivation class in a Module JAR.

      The set of known ModuleMetas, keyed by groupid:artifactId.

    • Field Detail

      • theMetas

        protected final HashMap<String,ModuleMeta[]> theMetas
        The set of known ModuleMetas, keyed by groupid:artifactId. Multiple versions of the ModuleMeta are ordered with the newest first.

      • ACTIVATION_CLASS_PROPERTY

        public static final String ACTIVATION_CLASS_PROPERTY
        Name of the (optional) property in pom.xml that identifies the activation/deactivation class in a Module JAR.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AbstractScanningModuleRegistry

        protected AbstractScanningModuleRegistry(HashMap<String,ModuleMeta[]> metas)
        Private constructor, for subclasses only.
        Parameters:
        metas - the ModuleMetas found, keyed by their name, and then ordered by version

    • Method Detail

      • determineResolutionCandidates

        public ModuleMeta[] determineResolutionCandidates(ModuleRequirement req)
        Determine the ModuleMetas that are candidates to resolve a Module dependency, based on the knowledge of this ModuleRegistry.
        Specified by:
        determineResolutionCandidates in class ModuleRegistry
        Parameters:
        req - the ModuleRequirement that we attempt to resolve
        Returns:
        the ModuleMetas that are candidates for the resolution of the ModuleRequirement, in sequence from best matched to least matched if the ModuleRegistry makes such distinctions

      • addModuleMeta

        protected static void addModuleMeta(ModuleMeta add,
                                    HashMap<String,ModuleMeta[]> metas)
        Add another ModuleMeta during runtime. Take care that we don't accidentally add the same one again.
        Parameters:
        add - the ModuleMeta to be added
        metas - the existing ModuleMetas

      • addParsedModuleMetasFromJars

        protected static void addParsedModuleMetasFromJars(List<JarFile> jars,
                                                   HashMap<String,ModuleMeta[]> result)
        Given a list of Jar filenames, parse the JARs and determine the ModuleMetas that they contain. Add them to the provided hash.
        Parameters:
        jars - the JarFiles to parse
        result - the hash to add results to

      • addParsedModuleMetasFromDirectories

        protected static void addParsedModuleMetasFromDirectories(List<File> dirs,
                                                          HashMap<String,ModuleMeta[]> result)
        Given a list of META-INF directories, determine the ModuleMetas that they contain. Add them to the provided hash.
        Parameters:
        dirs - the META-INF directories
        result - the hash to add the results to

      • parseMetadataFiles

        protected static ModuleMeta parseMetadataFiles(DocumentBuilderFactory dbf,
                                               JarFile jar,
                                               InputStream pomXmlEntryStream,
                                               InputStream pomPropertiesEntryStream,
                                               InputStream manifestEntryStream,
                                               InputStream pomFileStream)
                                        throws ParserConfigurationException,
                                               IOException,
                                               SAXException
        Helper method to parse metadata jar file entries into a ModuleMeta.
        Parameters:
        dbf - the XML parser factory
        jar - the JAR file containing the entries
        pomXmlEntryStream - reading the maven pom.xml file
        pomPropertiesEntryStream - reading the maven pom.properties file (if any)
        manifestEntryStream - reading the MANIFEST.MF file
        pomFileStream - read the POM from this stream, if given, otherwise use what's inside the JAR
        Returns:
        the created ModuleMeta
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - misconfigured XML parser
        IOException - I/O error
        SAXException - XML syntax error

      • rpmvercmp

        public static int rpmvercmp(String a,
                            String b)
        Helper method to compare two versions the way RPM does it. Null comes first, then ordered by dot-separate
        Parameters:
        a: - version 1 to compare
        b: - version 2 to compare
